io.lambdacube.aspecio

Class AspecioConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lambdacube.aspecio.AspecioConstants

  • public final class AspecioConstants
extends Object
    Public constants in Aspecio.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String _SERVICE_ASPECT_WOVEN
      The hidden property containing the array of Aspects effectively woven at any given time, for a woven service.
      static String ASPECIO_FILTER_SERVICES
      Whether or not Aspecio should filter away services that ask for weaving, effectively hiding them from all bundles except the system bundle and Aspecio itself.
      static String SERVICE_ASPECT
      The property a service should register to declare an Aspect.
      static String SERVICE_ASPECT_EXTRAPROPERTIES
      The property a service should register, on an Aspect, to ask Aspecio to declare a Boolean property in woven services set to Boolean.TRUE.
      static String SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE
      The property a service should register to require Aspecio to weave one or several aspects.
      static String SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE_OPTIONAL
      The property a service should register to ask Aspecio to optionally weave one or several aspects.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ASPECIO_FILTER_SERVICES

        public static final String ASPECIO_FILTER_SERVICES
        Whether or not Aspecio should filter away services that ask for weaving, effectively hiding them from all bundles except the system bundle and Aspecio itself. Set that property to "false" in the OSGi framework property or as Java system properties to change Aspecio's behavior.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE

        public static final String SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE
        The property a service should register to require Aspecio to weave one or several aspects. The property should be of type String[].
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE_OPTIONAL

        public static final String SERVICE_ASPECT_WEAVE_OPTIONAL
        The property a service should register to ask Aspecio to optionally weave one or several aspects. The property should be of type String[].
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_ASPECT

        public static final String SERVICE_ASPECT
        The property a service should register to declare an Aspect. The service object registered should be assignable to Interceptor to be recognized as a proper Aspect.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_ASPECT_EXTRAPROPERTIES

        public static final String SERVICE_ASPECT_EXTRAPROPERTIES
        The property a service should register, on an Aspect, to ask Aspecio to declare a Boolean property in woven services set to Boolean.TRUE.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • _SERVICE_ASPECT_WOVEN

        public static final String _SERVICE_ASPECT_WOVEN
        The hidden property containing the array of Aspects effectively woven at any given time, for a woven service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
